title: ESA Announces Reusable Upper Stage Demonstrator Project
summary:
The European Space Agency has published a call to begin work on a demonstrator of a reusable launch vehicle upper stage.

Published on 13 March,...

title: Fox Again Urges NASA Science Community to Stick Together
summary: Nicky Fox, the head of NASA’s Science Mission Directorate, again urged the NASA science community to stick together in these tough budget times and not split into factions fighting each […]

title: Space Force Budget Could Drop For First Time in FY2025
summary: President Biden’s FY2025 request for the U.S. Space Force is $29.4 billion, $600 million less than what he asked for in FY2024. Congress is still working on the FY2024 request. […]

title: NASA restructures Earth System Observatory to reduce costs
summary: NASA is revamping a major series of Earth science missions, delaying some and relying more on international partners for others to reduce costs.

title: Space Force selects startup Defense Unicorns to update software at launch ranges
summary: The startup won a $15 million Strategic Funding Increase, or STRATFI, agreement from SpaceWERX.
